ygData.subject: Re: [archive-crawler] Heritrix 3 bytes limit for each seed?
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello Peeter, I don t think there is a way to do that currently without writing some code. It is a feature I will need to add in the coming months however.

Hello Peeter,

I don't think there is a way to do that currently without wr=
iting some
code. It is a feature I will need to add in the coming months ho=
wever.

There is more than one way to implement it. I'm thinking the best w=
ay
would be to write a DecideRule that checks the stats for the seed
("sour=
ce tag"), and include that in your scope rules.

Noah
